body:
Release

Components
  • New Features or Enhancements
    • Browser Policy Notification:
      • In anticipation of rolling out the new ZNA Browser Policy, we are encouraging our users to upgrade their browsers to the most up to date version.
      • Beginning 12/1/2021, ZNA will begin support of a new Browser Policy that outlines details for minimum versions of the supported browsers: Chrome, Edge and Firefox.
    • Create a List
      • A new Advanced Options section has been added at the bottom of the screen.
        Now, narrow your search results even faster by filtering your list of Providers based on Address Confidence and Specialty Confidence scores.
        • Filter values are Low, Medium and High.
      • Lastly the "Other" filter values, were moved into the Advanced Options section to consolidate the filtering capabilities on screen.
    • Rank Networks:
      • Excluded networks are now listed in alphabetical order to help make it easier to locate and confirm exclusions.
    • Specialties:
      • Specialties are now listed in alphabetical order for the Adequacy Specification PDF report within Measure Access.
      • And, Specialties are also listed in alphabetical order on the Gap Map tab within Measure Access.
    • Homepage Map:
      • Users can now choose to display Network Strength OR Market Confirmed reports on the map; by clicking between two new toggle buttons near the bottom of the map.
      • Note: Brokers can ONLY see the Market Confirmed view of the map.
  • Fixed Issues
    • Project Settings:
      • On the Network Rankings Tab, the default Market Segments section is now hidden when no available projects have Market Segments.
      • The Specialty Mapping Tab is now properly displayed on screen after the user clicks the Project Settings link.
      • Broker users can no longer see the Specialty Mappings tab on the Project Settings screen.
    • System Performance:
      • Fixed a "Gateway Timeout" error message that some clients saw based on the criteria they chose for the Compare Networks report.
      • Some additional performance enhancements have been added for large Population Files.
        • Impacted Reports:
          • Create a List
          • Measure Access
